name: Zombie Craft Dungeons Survival
description:
You will land on an limitless island but beware you are not alone! Zombies will be coming for you when they detect movement and noise. You have to be fast and ready for action.
But don't be afraid survivor mode is just for you to have a better survival chance.
And there are plenty amount of dungeons hidden around you. Do not forget to look for them and use weapons from your inventory. Last by not least is you can craft your house too! Find the right blocks and your mine is ready to craft.
Have a good hunt and we hope you survive!
